products.name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser
products.description: A gentle cleanser that hydrates and cleanses the skin.
products.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser, etc.
products.usage: Apply to wet skin and massage in a circular motion.

products.name: Thayers Witch Hazel Toner
products.description: A soothing toner with witch hazel and aloe vera.
products.ingredients: Witch Hazel Extract, Aloe Vera, etc.
products.usage: Apply with a cotton pad after cleansing.

products.name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost
products.description: A hydrating gel that plumps and smooths the skin.
products.usage: Apply to face and neck in the morning and evening.

products.name: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
products.description: A hydrating serum that helps retain skin moisture.
products.usage: Apply a few drops to face in the morning and evening.

products.name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios
products.description: A high SPF sunscreen with broad-spectrum protection.
products.ingredients: Water, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, etc.
products.usage: Apply generously to face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.

products.name: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Foundation
products.description: A long-wear foundation that provides buildable coverage.
products.usage: Apply to face with a brush or sponge.

products.name: Maybelline Fit Me Concealer
products.description: A concealer that brightens and conceals imperfections.
products.usage: Apply under eyes and on blemishes.

products.name: Too Faced Better Than Sex Mascara
products.description: A volumizing mascara for dramatic lashes.
products.usage: Apply to lashes from root to tip.

products.name: Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz
products.description: A brow pencil that provides natural-looking definition.
products.usage: Define and fill brows with short strokes.

products.name: NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer
products.description: A creamy concealer that brightens and covers imperfections.
products.usage: Apply to areas needing coverage and blend.

products.name: Olaplex No. 3 Hair Perfector
products.description: A treatment that strengthens and repairs damaged hair.
products.usage: Apply to damp hair, leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse.

products.name: Moroccanoil Treatment
products.description: An oil treatment that nourishes and adds shine.
products.usage: Apply a small amount to damp hair and style as usual.

products.name: Redken Extreme Shampoo
products.description: A shampoo that strengthens and fortifies damaged hair.
products.usage: Apply to wet hair, lather, and rinse.

products.name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo
products.description: A dry shampoo that refreshes and volumizes hair.
products.usage: Shake well, spray onto roots from 6-10 inches away.

products.name: Paul Mitchell Tea Tree Special Conditioner
products.description: A conditioner that invigorates and moisturizes hair.
products.ingredients: Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Tea Tree Oil, etc.
products.usage: Apply to wet hair after shampooing, leave for 1-2 minutes, then rinse.

products.name: Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion
products.description: A daily lotion that provides long-lasting moisture.
products.usage: Apply generously all over the body, as needed.

products.name: Neutrogena Body Oil
products.description: A body oil that deeply moisturizes and smooths skin.
products.usage: Apply to damp skin after a shower for best results.

products.name: L'Occitane Almond Milk Concentrate
products.description: A rich body cream that firms and hydrates.
products.ingredients: Almond Milk, Almond Oil, Shea Butter, etc.
products.usage: Massage into body, focusing on dry areas.

products.name: Bath & Body Works Japanese Cherry Blossom Body Cream
products.description: A body cream with a delicate cherry blossom scent.
products.ingredients: Water, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, etc.
products.usage: Apply generously to skin, reapply as needed.

products.name: Nivea Essentially Enriched Body Lotion
products.description: A nourishing body lotion for dry skin.
products.usage: Apply evenly to body, especially to dry areas.

products.name: Chanel No. 5 Eau de Parfum
products.description: A classic fragrance with a timeless scent.
products.usage: Spray on pulse points.

products.name: Dolce & Gabbana Light Blue
products.description: A fresh and fruity fragrance with a Mediterranean touch.
products.usage: Apply to the neck and wrists.

products.name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
products.description: A bold fragrance with coffee and vanilla notes.
products.usage: Spray on pulse points.

products.name: Marc Jacobs Daisy
products.description: A floral fragrance with a playful touch.
products.usage: Apply to the neck and wrists.

products.name: Gucci Bloom
products.description: A rich floral fragrance with notes of tuberose and jasmine.
products.usage: Spray on pulse points.

products.name: Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides
products.description: A collagen supplement to support skin health.
products.usage: Mix with water or smoothies.

products.name: NeoCell Super Collagen + C
products.description: A collagen supplement with added Vitamin C.
products.usage: Take with water or juice.

products.name: Nature's Bounty Hair, Skin & Nails Gummies
products.description: Gummies that support healthy hair, skin, and nails.
products.ingredients: Vitamins A, C, D, E, Biotin
products.usage: Chew 2 gummies daily.

products.name: Garden of Life Vitamin Code Raw Zinc
products.description: A supplement to support skin and immune health.
products.usage: Take 1 capsule daily.

products.name: Ollie Beauty Gummies
products.description: Gummies designed for radiant skin and strong nails.
products.usage: Chew 2 gummies daily.
